Package eventHandling

Class EventQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • eventHandling.EventQueue

  • public class EventQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a queue datastructure that is used for the events within the simulation framework.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventQueue

        public EventQueue​()
        Creates empty event list.

      • EventQueue

        public EventQueue​(java.util.ArrayList<BatchJob> initialJobs)
        Creates event list and schedules submission events for all jobs in the passed list.
        Parameters:
        initialJobs - List of all jobs for which a submission event should be scheduled during the initialization of the queue.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleEvent

        public void scheduleEvent​(Event event)
        Schedules an event in the event queue.
        Parameters:
        event - Event that should be scheduled.

      • unscheduleEvent

        public void unscheduleEvent​(Event event)
        Removes an event from the event queue.
        Parameters:
        event - Event that should be removed.

      • rescheduleEvent

        public void rescheduleEvent​(Event event,
                            int newTimestamp)
        Reschedules an event from one point in simulation time to another. The timestamp of the passed event will be automatically adjusted.
        Parameters:
        event - Event that should be rescheduled.
        newTimestamp - New point in simulation time at which the event should be scheduled.

      • handledEvent

        public void handledEvent​(Event event)
        Moves an event from the event queue to the list of handled events.
        Parameters:
        event - Event that should be moved.

      • getEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getEvents​(EventType type,
                                       int time)
        Retrieves all events of a specific type that are scheduled at a specified point in simulation time.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of events that are requested.
        time - Point in simulation time for which the events are requested.
        Returns:
        List of all events of the specified times that are scheduled at the specified point in simulation time.

      • getAllEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getAllEvents​(long timestamp)
        Retrieves all events that are scheduled at a specified point in simulation time.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - Point in simulation time for which all scheduled events are requested.
        Returns:
        List of all events that are scheduled at the specified point in simulation time.

      • removeKey

        public void removeKey​(int timestamp)
        Removes the specified key from the map that stores the scheduled events.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - Key that should be removed from the map.

      • getAllKeys

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> getAllKeys​(EventType type)
        Retrieves all timestamps at which events of the specified type are scheduled.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of event for which the scheduled times are requested.
        Returns:
        Set of all points in simulation time at which events of the specified type are scheduled.
